assignment5_000813686

Class Wheel

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment5_000813686.Wheel

  • public class Wheel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a wheel with different subdivisions of type WheelSlice, it is meant to be used as a wheel of fortune. This class also uses the classes WheelSpinning and WheelStopping to allow the well functioning of some of its behaviours. Finally, this class is meant to be used by the class SpinTheWheel.

        Parameters:
        amountWon - Label that displays amountWon
        stopSpin - Button that stops the wheel spinning
